description: Try our easy to follow Twice Cooked Pork Belly recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Twice Cooked Pork Belly Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cook In bag recipe base honey BBQ chicken

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 190Â°C. Place pork and star anise into the roasting bag. Add the Cook in Bag Recipe Base mix and close the bag, using the tie provided. Gently rotate until pork is coated evenly with recipe base mix.
Place pork in bag onto a baking tray. Using a fork pierce top of bag. Cook for 50 minutes or until pork is cooked through.

Preheat grill to mediumhigh heat. Remove pork from bag, reserving meat juices. Slice pork. Place sliced pork on a baking tray lined with non-stick baking paper. Grill pork until golden brown and crisp.

Meanwhile pour reserved meat juices into a saucepan. Stir in brown sugar and soy sauce. Bring to the boil then reduce heat and simmer, stirring occasionally, for 23 minutes or until sauce has thickened slightly. Remove star anise and discard. Serve sauce drizzle over pork.
